name: places/ChIJS9VbfJNYwokRXtWgb--eWLU
formattedAddress: 429 E 75th St 5th Floor, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 429 E 75th St 5th Floor, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text:
Re:  Patient Name:  Rosalie Geraci
Dr. Griffin and his staff are wonderful.  The line of communication with his office staff before and after appointments and procedures is excellent.  Alba answered all my questions and was very patient with me.  My phone calls and texts were always answered promptly.  Dr. Griffin is an excellent pain management physician.  During each procedure, he explained what he was doing, and after each procedure, asked if I had any questions.  I did have questions, and he answered each and every one of them.  I am no longer in constant pain, and I highly recommend Dr. Griffin!

originalText.text: Dr. Griffin performed RAF ablations on my lumbar and sacral spine and for the first time in a long time, pain free. He is the consummate professional, skilled, and patient. His office staff is helpful, pleasant, and efficient, as well as the nurses and PAs. I highly recommend him and the HSS staff. 5 stars all around.

text.text: Dr. Griffin performed RAF ablations on my lumbar and sacral spine and for the first time in a long time, pain free. He is the consummate professional, skilled, and patient. His office staff is helpful, pleasant, and efficient, as well as the nurses and PAs. I highly recommend him and the HSS staff. 5 stars all around.

originalText.text:
I've been having right side sciatica for over 3 months. Pain was at the 7-8 level most of the time. Had an MRI through another doctor(surgeon) well respected. Was told I was not a surgical candidate.  Had alot more questions I wanted answered a month later. I was recommended to Dr Robert Griffin at HSS who specializes lower back pain, sciatica and other spine related issues. Dr Griffin was fantastic. Five stars all around. He thoroughly went through my MRI films along with the report. Took a full history on my sciatica symptoms from when it started to present. Did a physical exam checking my strength, reflexes, and pain areas. Then walked me through my MRI films and answered every question. Extremely patient, never rushed me. Gave me a few options to start my recovery and recommended where he thinks I should start.

I would highly recommend Dr Griffin without hesitation.

originalText.text: Dr Griffin is very knowledgeable. He treats his patients with respect. My epidural shot had great results.

text.text: Dr Griffin is very knowledgeable. He treats his patients with respect. My epidural shot had great results.

originalText.text:
Dr. Griffin is a real pro.  He is all business and doesn't spend a whole lot of time with small talk.  But, he knows his business.  His staff beginning with Alba, his secretary , are fabulous.  Alba listens carefully and works with you to set up appointments convenient for you and the doctor.  The nurses could not be more patient and understanding...They all take the necessary time to listen to you and give you answers.
I needed to have X-rays and CT scans of my back.  I was in from out of town and Alba managed to get my lined up for the test that same day.  The doctor has the results quickly and before I left town the following morning, Alba phone me and set up an appointment for me to have the procedure the following week.  Can't ask for better service than that.
Their office runs like clockwork.  From the check-in desk to Dr. Griffins nurses, they are efficient, understanding and patient.  I travel almost 6 hours to see him.  I have been his patient for about 8 years and he has always been right.  Do not hesitate to consider seeing Dr. Griffin.  He has 2 offices in NYC and Alba can help you decide which one works most convenient for you.
